properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the print job and the document

properties.name: printerId
properties.description: The network URL of the printer.Only supported on iOS.

properties.name: duplex
properties.description: Specifies the duplex mode to use for the print job.Either double-sided (duplex:true) or single-sided (duplex:false).Double-sided by default.Only supported on iOS

properties.name: landscape
properties.description: The orientation of the printed content, portrait or landscapePortrait by default.

properties.name: grayscale
properties.description: If your application only prints black text, setting this property to true can result in better performance in many cases.False by default.

properties.name: bounds
properties.description: The Size and position of the print view
